name: Office Defender
description:
Made in two weeks for LowRezGameJam2018!

Shoot down the alien ships while avoiding your boss!

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Fire Laser

P - pick up phone

CTRL - Hide screen from boss

coding/music/sound - @blkfinch

soundcloud.com/blkfinch

Art/Assets- Meagan Chamberlain

instagram: @pixel_fart
